mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dohaney, Michael
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Feels that the Democrats are "losing time"; feels that their opponents are the "pro-slavery party", but feels that the task now is to "show the hollowness and heartlessness" of their argument; claims that Irish and German voters are becoming more "rational" and will vote against the Democrats out of a dislike for slavery. Autograph Letter Signed
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, undated, Michael Dohaney, New York, N.Y. to Robert Tyler
